lyrics.text: The Maze
Verse1
Morning breaks with a distant cry,
Thrown into this world under an endless sky.
They hand us our meanings，
we wear them like chains,
A system designed to feed on our pain.
Chorus
Roles we grow, carved out in stone,
Freedom's a rumor, barely known.
Desire flickers in the eye of a storm,
Lost in echoes where the lust is born.
Verse2
Winter grips tight, silence bites,
In frost- covered night, fire keeps alight.
Death buried deep within our chest,
Holding to dreams whennothing's left.
Chorus
No stars above, no maps to guide,
But purpose is something fate can't deny.
Hope flickers in the eye of a storm,
Lost in echoes where darkness forms.
Verse3
Through chaos we stumble, trust fades away,
Fighting for meaning in the shadows we stray.
Scars and laughter, the pain we retain,
These moments define why we're insane.
Bridge
No straight lines, no escape clear,
A door swings open, another gate appears.
Sein ist Zeit, und Zeit ist Sein,
Existence is time,
and time is blade,
Cutting through shadows where fears are made.
No straight lines
nobody can escape.
